Dear friends,

I hope the summer is going well and smoothly for you.

I just updated my demo reel after more than a year. Go take a look, and let me know what you think!

Finally, my ever-growing (and ever-awesome) friend and roommate Joseph Spinelli is performing in Edinburgh, Scotland in a 5-star reviewed production of RENT. Go see it if you can. I did, I cried.

Much love.
